samples.question: Do you think diet is important?
samples.transcript: Oh, that is a very interesting question because as I remember I have always been very careful with my diet and what I eat since I was a teenager. So yes absolutely that is important. Nice.

samples.question: And what is a balanced diet?

samples.question: Now, why do you think some people choose to be vegetarians?
samples.transcript: Hm. since I used to be a vegetarian for a short time, a couple of years ago, I can say that it depends on so many different reasons. For example, some people might decide to be vegetarians because of their health, because of concerns for animals, or even some religious reasons. therefore I would have to say maybe some other people decide to do that because they cannot afford to buy meat, fish or chicken or any animal products, animal products. And yeah these can be the reasons why people can choose vegetarianism. Mhm.
